name: Mini vMac Pseudo-Repository
short_description:
This project will (hopefully) be a secondary repository of all files hosted at the Gryphel Project's main site, precluding that I can get permission...

I am also planning to upload build templates for people who don't quite understand the build options but don't mind typing things out from one file into another. I might also offer ready-to-compile versions of my personal version of Mini vMac, but that's assuming people won't compile them, then claim the builds as their own.

Also, I will NOT compile custom variations for you. I will also not tolorate anyone requesting any from me or anyone else that might visit besides the original creator of Mini vMac. Go to the Mini vMac project if you want one without doing any coding or compiling or typing.
